attributes.action: Increase Sentencing for possession of a knife
attributes.additional_details: I have seen that knife crime has had a major increase over the years and something needs to be done.
attributes.background:
I am doing a GCSE campaign on knife crime and I wish to strongly express my concern with the increase in knife crime. This is why 
I feel the sentencing for holding a knife should be increased as people are not learning and knife crime is still increasing.
